title: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       The National Park Service and its state and local partners have prepared multiple resources to help you plan a visit to fun and inspiring places in the Chesapeake Bay watershed. See the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network map and guide for contact information and location of each partner site in the Network. Do you have a smart phone or tablet? Download Chesapeake Explorer -- the NPS official mobile application for the watershed.
